group_1.textLeft: If public safety in Yukuni improves, we'll reconcile@with Magical Girls and their supporters.

group_1.textRight: How could it be ok?@The sacrifices of the past won't change.

group_1.textLeft: I thought there were a few more bones to pick,@but Kuroda has become completely complacent.

group_1.textRight: Nevertheless, even if the Magical Girls do produce@results, it'll just be meaningless
if they don't get acknowledged by the public.@So, I'm encouraging fellow Eradicators to act.
We're manipulating public perceptions through@group messages and similar means.

group_1.textLeft: You say that, but if the school is quiet then it'll@give the impression that our momentum's waned.
Maybe we shouldn't be so aggressive, but play@with crocodile tears instead.

group_1.textCenter: Such underhanded methods no longer work@in this conflict.

group_1.textLeft: You, you're one of the Advocates...

group_1.textRight: We no longer cower in fear of those in power.
If you spread malicious rumors on social media@or message boards,
then we will just keep writing to counter every@word you spew.
If you're going to play up a sob story at school,
then we, the Advocates, will prove that those@hands you wipe your tears with
are stained wet with the blood of Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: Where does this might of yours come from now?

group_1.textRight: Although we were in hiding, we've always been@right beside you.
We have enough people here to stand up to you.
Shirogane-san, there's been hate speech in the@Yukuni International Schoolyard...

group_1.textLeft: Please have a few people go ahead and stop it@before it becomes serious.

group_1.textRight: There are members at that school too, so I think@it'll be okay.

group_1.textLeft: ...No matter what we try to do, our information@will get leaked.

group_1.textRight: There are Eradicators who have infiltrated our@ranks, as well.
If our forces rival each other equally, then@the rest depends on the Magical Girls' actions.
This is a watershed moment that will determine@the fate of these girls.
Why don't we cooperate and watch how things@unfold, together?
